text:
Created attachment 33772
Patch file generated via Ant script

This patch deprecates HSSFCellUtil in favor of CellUtil all methods simply called directly (or indirectly in one case) a method in CellUtil.

creator: onealj@apache.org
text: Applied in r1739531, updated changelog in r1739532. Thanks for the patch!
